content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Enjoy the sugaring or browse the shelves at one of our locations.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_column_text]

Sugaring NYC Union Square

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Sugaring NYC Union Square Location opened its doors in June 2018 and became a flagship NYC store for Sugaring NYC. Lashes NYC – a boutique Eyelash Extension studio is also hosted in this location, offering high-quality eyelash services at an affordable price.[/vc_column_text]

SUGARING NYC – Union Square

46 West 14 Street
New York, NY 10011
(646)490-7353

Mo. – Fr.:
9:00AM – 10:00PM
Sa.:
9:00AM – 8:00PM
Su.:
9:00AM – 7:00PM
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Sugaring NYC Upper East Side

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Sugaring NYC Upper East Side Location was added to the line of Sugaring NYC stores in 2019. Lexington Avenue is one of New York’s busiest streets and this location is of great convenience for Manhattan’s Upper East Side residents. We allocated a great team of estheticians to this location to make sure we exceeded the expectations.[/vc_column_text]

SUGARING NYC – Upper East Side

1225 Lexington Avenue
New York, NY 10028
1-888-647-8427

Mo. – Fr.:
9:00AM – 9:00PM
Sa.:
9:00AM – 8:00PM
Su.:
9:00AM – 7:00PM
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Sugaring NYC Midtown

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Sugaring NYC 5th Avenue Location is conveniently located on the 30th street between 5th Ave and Broadway, 1 block away from the iconic Herald Square. Close to all major subway lines and ground transportation.[/vc_column_text]

SUGARING NYC – Midtown

5 W 30th Street
New York, NY 10001
(917) 409-3844

Mo. – Fr.:
9:00AM – 10:00PM
Sa.:
9:00AM – 8:00PM
Su.:
9:00AM – 7:00PM
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Sugaring NYC Columbus Circle

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Sugaring NYC Columbus Circle  is conveniently located within a 2 minute walk from 8 major subway lines this location is one of the busiest locations we operate.[/vc_column_text]

SUGARING NYC Columbus Circle

315 West 57th Street, Office 405
1-888-647-8427

Mo. – Fr.:
9:00AM – 10:00PM
Sa.:
9:00AM – 8:00PM
Su.:
9:00AM – 7:00PM
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Sugaring NYC Park Slope, Brooklyn

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Sugaring NYC Brooklyn Location is conveniently located on the 7th Avenue, only a few blocks away from Flatbush Avenue and Barkley’s Center.[/vc_column_text]

Sugaring NYC Brooklyn

100 7th Ave
Brooklyn, NY 11215
(347) 529-4742

Mo. – Fr.:
9:00AM – 8:00PM
Sa.:
9:00AM – 7:00PM
Su.:
9:00AM – 7:00PM
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Sugaring NYC Astoria, QUEENS

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Sugaring NYC Astoria, QUEENS location opened its doors in 2018 becoming the first location for Sugaring NYC in Queens. This location combines all the best features of our locations — the big, spacious salon can simultaneously service more than 10 people to ensure less wait times, more amazing service, and more smiles on our customers’ faces.[/vc_column_text]

SUGARING NYC ASTORIA QUEENS

32-77 Steinway Street
Astoria, Queens 11103
(347) 730-6750

Mo. – Fr.:
8:00AM – 10:00PM
Sa.:
8:00AM – 8:00PM
Su.:
8:00AM – 7:00PM
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_column_text]

Locations in other cities:

Sugaring NYC is a Nationwide franchise with locations across United States. Visit our store locator to discover all the locations. 

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”All Sugaring NYC Locations” style=”3d” shape=”round” color=”juicy-pink” size=”lg” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sugaringbooking.com%2F|target:_blank”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Franchising Opportunities.

We believe that every girl deserves to enjoy smooth silky skin, so we’re doing our best to make our services available nationwide. If you’re interested in opening a Sugaring salon in your city – click here

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_column_text]

Follow us @SugaringNYC

Tag your “before” and “after” selfies with #gotsugar to get featured and receive a sweet surprise.

In order to reap the full benefits that sugaring h
We are offering free sugaring performed by our lo
Say Aloha to our cozy coconut scrub. Our scrub wil
Before scheduling your next sugaring appointment,
Our superheroes ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
No more excuses! If not today 📅, then when? Too
Load More... Follow on Instagram
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
